node.title: Two critically injured after boat gets into difficulty off Bluff coast
node.description: Two people have been taken to hospital in a critical condition after a boat ran into difficulty off the coast of Southland.
node.content:
["Two people have been taken to hospital in a critical condition after a boat ran into difficulty off the coast of Southland.", "", "
The boat is in difficulty in the waters between Bluff Port and Tiwai Wharf (file picture). Photo: 123RF
", "Police said it is believed four people were on the boat when it got into difficulty in the water between Bluff Port and Tiwai Point wharf.", "A St John spokesperson confirmed two people had been taken to Southland Hospital in a critical condition.", "Emergency services were called about 12.20pm and Police, Coastguard and St John responded.", "A St John spokesperson said three ambulances and a rapid response unit were sent."]
